PathOfBuilding.Notes:
I ^1DON'T ^6^7recommend this build on a budget if you are not comfortable with setting up a character. You can make it work for less than 10d but it will require some game knowledge. I would play lightning strike slayer instead, it should be much smoother and straight forward on a budget.
^xD02090What is the difference between the different versions?^7
^x8888FFLeech:^7 MASSIVE recovery via leech, up to 7K ES / sec, as long as you are hitting. If you are not hitting you have no recovery. Solve this with using a Writhing Jar Unique Hp flask and then hit the worms to get leech back. Much easier to set up on a budget. More damage than armor setup.
^xE05030Armor:^7 Higher Physical Dmg Reduction, basically immortal in maps thanks to aegis + block, however sacrifices damage.
BUDGET^xE05030 LETHAL PRIDE^7 JEWEL
https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Settlers/KvLKQEni5
Hover over gear to see crafting info
^xE05030LEVELING: ^7While playing lightning strike post campaign pre ES swap, you should be using a trinity setup with an elemental damage claw.
^x8888FFSPECTRE: ^7 ^x8888FFDark marionette^7 linked with guardian's blessing and haste and use it when the spectre is alive for a dps boost
^xAF6025MANDATORY UNIQUES:^7 Ephemeral Edge (doesnt have to be corrupted) Voice of the storm
^xE05030WHAT TO PRIORITIZE BUYING AFTER MANDATORY UNIQUES:^7
1. Shavronne's Revelation 2. Good ES gear 3. Light of meaning % ES or % lightning dmg if budget 4. Good rare jewels 5. Ephemeral Edge with Resolute Technique 6. Good clusters 7. Forbidden Flame / Flesh
If you have a mageblood i recommend going a melding setup and getting 90% all max res

Skill.label: ^6Lightning Strike Swap After Acts See Notes
Cold snap is for frenzy generation, pop once in a
monster pack and you should be good for 30 sec
